_header: God that all this mights may in heaven & earth thy will is oo
_description: A prayer of confession — seven 8-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
God þat al þis myhtes mayin heuene & erþe
                    þy wille ys oo…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…In þy merci y me dogod þat al þis myhtes
                    may
BLHar2253.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.

PlimptonAd3.First Lines:
God þat alle myȝtes mayin heuene and erþe þi
                    wille is oo…
PlimptonAd3.Last Lines:
…Mercy lord and be my botegod þat alle myȝtes
                    may
PlimptonAd3.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 156-60.

BLAdd5901.First Lines:
God that alle myghtes may in heuen and erth thi will is ooI have
                    ben tynt many a day eerly and late haue y ben thi foo…
BLAdd5901.Last Lines:
…I haue ben fals in cropes rote to wickid werkis my wille was
                    ayMarcy lord and be my bote: gofe that alle myghtes may
BLAdd5901.Note:
A nineteenth-century transcript of New York,  Columbia University Library Plimpton Addenda 3 [olim Pratt], f.
                        241v. Two verse lines per manuscript line.
